title: Kenneth Cole REACTION Mens T-Shirt Pack of 3 - UPF 50+ Cotton/Spandex Jersey Slim Fit T Shirts for Men - Tee Shirts 3-Pack
description: T Shirts for Men Pack: Kenneth Cole REACTION short-sleeve T-shirt for men is offered in a convenient three pack of solid black tee shirts. These men's T-shirts can be worn to work and on the weekend for variety in wear
Slim Fit T Shirts for Men: Mens tees have a slim fit for a modern look and feel that wears well tucked or untucked
Stretch Jersey Fabric with UPF 50+ Protection: Black Tshirts for men are fabricated from cotton jersey with spandex for stretch and shape. Jersey knit fabric provides UPF 50+ protection
Baby Rib Crew Neckline: Tshirt for men features a 1x1 baby rib knit crew neckline, hemmed cuff on the short sleeves, and straight hemline
Great Choice for Everyday Layering: This Kenneth Cole REACTION T-shirt 3-pack is a luxurious tee to wear underneath jackets, sweaters, dress shirts, and blazers
